actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Consumer Credit Protection Act to prohibit discrimination by creditors on the basis of sex or marital status in connection with any extension of credit.

summary.text: Prohibits, under the Consumer Credit Protection Act, discrimination by creditors on the basis of sex or marital status in connection with any extension of credit. Prescribes a civil liability for violations of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Consumer Credit Protection Act to prohibit discrimination by creditors on the basis of sex or marital status in connection with any extension of credit.
